column4: Is 64-bit support just as lacking or cumbersome in Ubuntu as it is in Windows and other Linux distros (Fedora background)?  I typically stick to i686 since PAE gives access to large amounts of memory just fine.
flash is proprietary technology, the release schedule of it is dependant on Adobe, not with the linux distributions
exactly.  But with 32bit, Flash support is kept current.
I do believe they've done some advancements lately tho
